title: I Pick Up
subtle: Personal Recount (fiction), 42 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 20L
description: In I Pick Up, a boy practices the important life skill of organization. Sentence patterns and supportive illustrations guide students as they read.
meta: blanket, book, pick, room, shoes, teddy bear
Use the reading strategy of sequencing events to understand text
Problem and Solution : Identify problem and solution
Blend Onset and Rime : Blend onset and rime
Periods : Recognize and understand the use of periods

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
